| style="text-align: center;" |[[Dragon magazine 200|Dragon #200]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Lord Kuldak Maurancz
| style="text-align: center;" |Elminster's recounts his visit to [[Kuldak Maurancz]], Lord of [[Cragmyr]] near [[Beregost]] in his—according to rumor, haunted—keep.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{drsup|200/Elminster's Notebook: Lord Kuldak Maurancz}}
|-
| style="text-align: center;" |[[Dragon magazine 202|Dragon #202]]
| style="text-align: center;" |The Mystery of the Plains
| style="text-align: center;" |In this article, [[Elminster]] reports on a mysteriously clean, but seemingly non-[[magic]]al [[sword]] stuck in the ground in [[Mulhorand]] with many old remains of dead [[demihuman]]s about it.
| style="text-align: center;" |{{drsup|202/Mystery of the Plains}}

| style="text-align: center;" |The Serpent Blade

| style="text-align: center;" |Aldreth Fireshar

| style="text-align: center;" |[[Dragon magazine 216|Dragon #216]]
| style="text-align: center;" |Kobold Commotions
| style="text-align: center;" |Elminster notes past and present [[kobold]] activities and holdings at a number of different places in [[Faerûn]].
| style="text-align: center;" |{{drsup|216/Elminster's Notebook: Kobold commotions}}
